model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A class describing a cardgame board. The class keeps track of the cards on the board with the help of an ArrayList
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.
